Security
  



    Management
  



    AI
  



    Productivity
  



    Accessibility
  









Take a proactive approach to protecting corporate data 

    With Chrome Enterprise, your organization benefits from security features that protect billions of users on the web. Set policies, apply data loss prevention (DLP), limit password reuse, and defend against malware and phishing attacks.
  

      Protect your enterprise
  








    Secure by design
  


    Chrome is secure by default. Each web page and application runs in its own isolated environment, protecting other tabs, extensions, and your device from malicious code.
  







    Quick critical fixes and updates
  


    Chrome addresses updates to zero-day vulnerabilities and critical fixes faster than other Chromium-based browsers, so you can rest easy knowing youâre working with the latest protections. Automatic updates help ensure your employees are always working in the safest environment.
  







    Keeping users safe
  


    Google Safe Browsing protections keep users from visiting harmful and malicious sites based on data from 5B+ users. You can also apply advanced malware scanning, phishing protections, and data loss prevention (DLP) to take security to the next level.
  







    Zero Trust access
  


    Context-aware access controls built into Chrome Enterprise help ensure that employees and contractors have secure access to the apps and information they need â without compromising your corporate data.
  
























Seamless management and insights 

    Your organization needs a browser that can adapt along with your business needs. Start with our foundational security of Chrome Enterprise Core at no cost. For advanced protections, such as data loss prevention and context-aware access control, upgrade to Chrome Enterprise Premium.


      Explore Chrome Enterprise Core
  













    24/7 support from Google
  



    Keep users connected to the web and critical apps with Chromeâs enterprise support services. Get direct online and phone access to a Google team thatâs happy to help you troubleshoot issues and avoid downtime. 
  

      Explore enterprise support
  








Enhance your organizationâs efficiency with AI 

    Enable your end users to work more efficiently than ever with the latest AI features from Chrome Enterprise. 
  






    Elevate your writing
  

    Draft emails, blogs, and more faster with Help me write. From proofreading to grammar checks, Chrome can help with efficiently creating content. 
  










    Chat with Gemini
  

    Give employees quick access to information and help with tasks like writing, summarizing information and more, with Geminiâs direct integration in Chrome.
  










    Optimize your tabs, automatically
  

    Employees get automatic suggestions and grouping based on their open tabs with Tab Organizer. 
  










    Rediscover your past searches
  

    Pick up where you left off by finding previous Google searches faster than ever before with our AI-enabled history search.
  





















Power-up productivity with Chrome 

    Now more than ever before, most of the workday happens on the web. With Chrome Enterprise, both IT and employees win productivity gains that help them get more done.
  








    Find what you need, seamlessly
  


    Pick up your search where you last left off, and surface bookmarks, Drive files, and browser history from your address bar. Using Google Lens, itâs easier than ever to select, search and ask follow-up questions about anything in the browser, all from your current tab.
  







    Get helpful Google tools and features
  


    Google builds powerful tools that make it easy to connect and get things done. And all of it works on Chrome. Offline integration with apps like Gmail and Docs helps you work even when you donât have access to Wi-Fi, and you get the best of Google with Translate, Search, AI, and more right in your browser.
  







    Create a custom web experience
  


    Designate specific homepages and new tab pages. Preset bookmarks to give employees easy access to company resources and apps.
  







    Make Chrome browser work for your business
  


    Deploy hundreds of policies and customizations using Chromeâs cloud management. With just a few clicks, configure browser updates, versions, access controls, and more all from one place.
  
























Tools and technology built for  everyone 

    Support all your users, including those with:
  




Flip card.


    Learning and processing challenges
  





    Learning and processing challenges
  



    Remove distractions from web pages with Reader Mode
  


    Choose words or pages to be read aloud with Select-to-Speak
  


    Customize voice, speech rate, and more with Text-to-Speech
  


    Open long descriptions of complex content and images
  










Flip card.


    Low vision
  





    Low vision
  



    Set font sizes across all web pages
  


    Make PDF content more accessible
  


    Get automatic AI-powered image descriptions
  


    Customize color schemes with High Contrast Mode
  










Flip card.


    Limited hearing
  





    Limited hearing
  



    Generate automatic captions from calls or videos with Live Caption
  


    Customize caption size, color, and typeface
  


    Transcribe Speech-to-Text in real time with Live Transcribe
  










Flip card.


    Mobility challenges
  





    Mobility challenges
  



    Browse web pages using arrow keys with Keyboard Browsing
  


    Use keyboard combinations instead of clicks with Keyboard Shortcuts
